faqs.question: What tools are used to detect water leaks?
faqs.answer: Professionals use infrared cameras, acoustic leak detectors, and moisture meters to locate leaks behind surfaces without causing damage.

faqs.question: Can I detect a leak under tiles or concrete?
faqs.answer: Yes, with thermal and sound-based technologies, many leaks under tiled floors or slabs can be detected without excavation.
